summary: Broken Deal
title: Broken Deal
body:
Masterlist

Summary: The Reader and Tony have a deal. But after a couple of months of going steady with this deal, the Reader feels like she can’t go on with it.

Pairing: Tony Stark x Reader

Words: 1137

Warnings: fluff, implied smut, insecurities

A/N: I’m really on a Tony Stark trip lately lol. Also, the ‘friends with benefits that catch feelings for each other’ is one of my favourite tropes so I’m probably gonna be doing that with other characters as well. If you have a specific character you want me to do it for, feel free to send me a message and request one!

(gif was found on giphy)

Tony’s arms were tight around her, his embrace one of warmth and safety. She wanted to get used to this so madly, although she knew his alarm would go off in about ten minutes and he’d fly to wherever his next business meeting was.

He probably met another much more beautiful woman than she was there and flirt with her only to end up with her legs wrapped around his waist at the end of the night.

Y/N forced herself to wake up before he did so she had some time to get one last look at him and enjoy the feeling of his arms wrapped around her like a safety blanket before he left again.

Tony’s hair in the morning would have to be the most adorable thing she’d ever seen. The thick, dark strands stood up in every possible direction and her fingers were aching to run through the softness of it.

“You’re awake early,” He muttered, his voice still hoarse from sleep as he placed a feather-light kiss on her forehead.

“And you’re always gone early. Sometimes, I’d like to kiss you goodbye,” She whispered back as her fingers kept running through his hair. Her nails scratched his scalp causing him to almost let out a purr.

Tony didn’t reply, knowing this wasn’t part of the relationship they had. Whenever he came back from whatever country he visited, he stopped by her place to stay the night.

Friends with benefits and nothing more.

Three months ago, she was strong enough and declined the dinner he offered her. But she knew she was falling for him, further down into the abyss she was sure to never return from. Declining one dinner wouldn’t make the difference.

He didn’t feel the same way, she was sure of that. After all, he showed her as much when he came by her apartment smelling like a way too expensive feminine perfume.

She also kept pushing him away to keep it that way. Sometimes, when he looked at her with a sad expression she would feel bad, however, she also knew that it was for the best.

Y/N already told herself this needed to stop two weeks ago, but she still let him in when he knocked on her door last night. And she still let him pick her up and wrap her legs around his hips while he attacked her neck with his lips and teeth. She let him undress her, kiss her breathless and, most importantly, love her, while she knew it meant nothing more than sex to him. But she let that tiny flame of hope burn deep within the cavities of her heart.

It was quiet between them, her fingers now tracing the outlines of his arc reactor, the glowing metal cool beneath her fingertips. The alarm rang through the room, disturbing the silence Y/N clung to with a desperation she didn’t know she had. He reached to turn it off but didn’t make an attempt to get out of bed.

She closed her eyes when she felt his fingers comb through her hair.

“I wish I could hate you sometimes,”

Her words were quiet, a mere whisper to herself but it clung to the thick, tense air in the room and loomed over them like a threatening shadow. She didn’t mean for him to hear the words despite her addressing him directly, but of course, he heard, his face was a few inches away from hers.

Tony let out a soft gasp of surprise as the harshness of her words bit into his very being. He was about to speak up, but she interrupted his attempt, “Sometimes, I wish I was strong enough to just say no. to slam the door in your face and let you stand outside with an open mouth. I want to leave you, so you can search for another girl to have during the night – one that doesn’t get attached so easily.” Her words were spoken as soft as the ones before, her tone vulnerable and shaky.

Precisely how she felt.

Tony let her words sink in and settle deep within his heart, causing it to ache at hat she said. He wanted her to have told him earlier, so he could say he loved her and he was always about to tell her he wanted her to come with him everytime he left. But she pushed him away, making him hesitate about his feelings towards her and masking them with the usual cocky exterior he built up over the years.

At these moments though, he was somehow sure he loved her and always wanted to have her by his side no matter what.

“But you are Tony Stark. You don’t care and that’s okay, this between us is not built to care for each other or-“

“I love you,”

The words escaped him before they went through any of the remaining filters he had inside of his brain. Y/N blinked in surprise, not sure if he said that so she wouldn’t end this ‘deal’ or if he really meant it.

“Pack your bags, come with me,” he continued, caressing her cheeks with the back of his fingers.

“What?” Y/N stammered, her eyes still wide like saucers and her mouth hung slightly agape. She wasn’t sure what Tony was saying and her heart told her to not get her hopes up too hastily.

Maybe she was still fast asleep, and this was all just a dream when she woke up he would most likely be gone again.

But as she pinched her arm, a sharp pain told her this was, in fact, not a dream at all. It was real, and the realisation caused goosebumps to raise upon her skin, covering her entire body.

“What are you waiting for? Come on!” Lewis threw the covers off him and stood up, pulling her with him. He gripped her by the waist and twirled her in the air making her let out a surprised sound that was somewhere between a squeal and a giggle.

As he set her back on her feet, she stared into his deep eyes in awe, “Say it again,”

“I love you,” He repeated, a smile tugging at the corners of his lips.

Y/N broke out into a huge grin, a giggle escaping her, “I love you too,”

Their lips met in a sweet, soft kiss, causing her to melt in his arms as she felt the care and passion he put into this gesture they’ve done so many times before. But this time it was different, his lips didn’t feel like the rough hastiness anymore.

They felt like home.

—

Feel free to leave a message or ask if you wanna be added to my taglist!

Taglist: @thatsunacceptable - @jitterbuck - @kuro-no-kenshi - @bellamyblakemorley

blog.description: Ever wondered what Marvel characters did in their daily lives? Be a lot cooler if ya did.  Come with Sass or don't come at all.

summary:

Steve Rogers: oh yeah, like what?
Tony Stark: Like you’re a dick.
Steve:...
body:
Tony Stark: I’ve learned a lot since you’ve been gone.


Steve Rogers: oh yeah, like what?


Tony Stark: Like you’re a dick.


Steve: yeah, that’s true.


Steve with a smile: you got any beer?


Tony sighing, smiling back: in the fridge.

blog.name: fanaticfangirl2602
blog.title: small tree energy
blog.description: "I'm a fangirl. It's an occupational hazard." Belle | USA, CST | Fibro + Lyme + Alopecia | Angy dared me to change my icon to this | SEMI HIATUS DUE TO ADULTING AND LIFE IN GENERAL

summary: Tony Stark
question: Tony Stark
answer:
1) fight them or fight for them
Fight for. *Looks at what he went through in Infinity War* *And what Marvel has put him through in general* FIGHT F OR.

2) on a scale of 1-10 how excited do I get when I see them
NIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIINE!

3) would i smooch
Hmm, probably not? I would give him a platonic kiss on the cheek, but that’s it.

4) have I drawn/written about them/should i draw/write about them
I’ve never drew him, but I definitely want to start trying soon. I’ve never drawn facial hair before, so that’ll be a fun challenge. summary: Ok so lets pretend A4 has a happy ending, including Team Cap apologizing for treating Tony like sh*t and the Avengers are just...
body:
Ok so lets pretend A4 has a happy ending, including Team Cap apologizing for treating Tony like sh*t and the Avengers are just domestic and fluffy with each other

(Long shitty headcanon ahead)

Tony invites Scott over for a couple days (cause Engineer Bros) and Scott brings Cassie with him. Peter’s also at the new compound (and someone who’s definitely not Rhodey put up a framed embroidery saying “in this house we love and appreciate Tony Stark” right at the door) and while The Dads are working they build a badass version of that cardboard maze/obstacle over several floors and thanks to Peter’s webs they add some insane loops and ceiling parts. And everytime they cross ways with one of the teammates (mostly when Spider-Man’s chasing Cassie, criminal mastermind with a heart of gold) they instantly join and team up with her. Bucky whoops Peter’s butt with an insane rubber knife choreo, Vision literally takes her through walls and they both snicker at the THUD when Peter tries to follow but hits the concrete instead. Sam lets her operate Redwing and they have an epic fight in the backyard with Droney while Rhodey sneaks up behind Peter and pushes him into the pool (mocking Pete’s spideysenses becomes a running gag after this). Thor stops by at some point, puts Cassie on his shoulders and Peter kinda freezes so that the two of them just… walk by and get some snacks. A few minutes later Banner bumps into a completely starstruck Peter constantly mumbling “that really was Thor… man he’s just awesome…” and Bruce is like ikr???? And they team up to find Cassie and the Pirate Angel. Meanwhile Thor and Cassie had tea and some donuts with Luis, Dave and Kurt who dropped by to have Scott look over some blueprints but immediately join the game.

From that moment on the Avengers (+visitors) slowly split in two camps fighting The Cardboard Wars and maybe Tony and Scott would’ve never found out if Stephen and Wong hadn’t dropped by. While Strange and the Engineer Bros have a talk in Tony’s basement workshop Wong gets caught in a marshmallow crossfire and in the resulting brawl he accidentally opens a portal and nine of them crash down into the workshop, knocking over Scott and causing DUM-E to release the Kraken of fire extinguishers. Tony demands to know what the hell is going on but just waves it off after the first seven minutes of Luis’ explanation and makes all of them sign a truce over the largest pizza NYC has to offer.

———-

Tagging @peterparkerisntdead cause that all-in-crossover from a few weeks ago still haunts me and there are still some rough drafts for it I’ll never finish. THIS IS WHAT WEIRD INPUT DOES TO ME sorrynotsorry

summary: Behind the armor (Tony Stark x Reader)
body:
Behind the armor (Tony Stark x Reader)

Summary: In which Y/N helps a closed off Tony with a panic attack which leads to her telling him what he really needed to hear . (Post Civil-War & Pre Infinity War)

Word Count: 660

Pairings: Tony Stark x Reader

Warnings: Angst, Fluff if you squint

A/N: Tbh I was in a soft “I love Tony Stark and will die for him” mood when I wrote this but when am I not?

Dedicated to: @hcneymel

MASTERLIST

You knew about Tony’s panic attacks, barely.

Tony tended to be closed off, not speaking about his feelings to anyone, not even FRIDAY, like how he used to with JARVIS. But you don’t blame him, with everything that went on you’d get why he wouldn’t bother.

Although Tony never allowed you to see him at his worst, he didn’t want you to look at him differently, even though he knew you wouldn’t but he thought you wouldn’t understand.

However this was one that he had no control over at all.

Tony shook off his blazer and hung it on the hanger after turning on the shower before stripping down to get ready to shower, after a long day of meetings and stressful decisions all he wanted to do was curl up in bed with you by his side.

But as he stepped into the shower, instead of being greeted with the warm steam he was greeted with ice cold water, the water touching his skin feeling like sharp icicles piercing his skin as he feels all his bones in his body freeze up.

Tony feels himself panicking as he backs into the wall, breathing heavily as he puts his hand over his chest, eyes filling up with tears as he feels his surrounding suffocating him. Memories from the attack on New York flashed through his mind, the Chitauri, flying the missile into space, feeling the lack of air and ice cold atmosphere of the galaxy suffocate him causing him to lose consciousness.

“Shit shit shit.” You heard him cry out in pain causing you to immediately get out of the bed and step towards the bathroom, coming closer to the bathroom you heard wheezing which made you quickly open the bathroom door, to be greeted Tony curled up in the corner of the shower, eyes shut tightly as the freezing water hit his pale skin.

You opened the shower door without hesitation which caused the water to now soak you, you gasped as it was freezing and went to turn it off before sitting on your knees in front of Tony, putting your hand on his cheek causing him to face you.

“Tony.. look at me, you’re at home, okay? I need you to breathe for me, breathe in for four seconds and breathe out for four seconds, do it with me.” You say, putting a hand on his own that was on his chest, not wanting to suffocate him but wanting him to feel grounded.

He slowly opened his eyes, looking back at you with his red rimmed eyes, blinking rapidly as he tried to mimic your breathing pattern.

“You’re okay.” You whispered as his breathing pattern gradually got better, feeling himself calm down from his panic attack he looked at you embarrassed.

“I’m sorry you ha-”

“Don’t you dare finish that sentence Stark, you shouldn’t be sorry for anything, but please don’t hide your feelings from me-” You say as you hold his hands in between your own, leaving a kiss on his knuckles.

“I love you and appreciate you, okay? I love you Tony Stark and I want you to know that you CAN talk to me about anything because I am here for you.” You ramble.

“W-why?” He says, surprised from your speech.

“Because I know you. I know how much you care for people, strangers, loved ones and even people you’ve only known for a couple seconds. You are the most selfless, caring person I have ever met and would sacrifice yourself for the safety of others. You are a role model to others and myself-”

“You, Tony Stark, an amazing person inside and out and I hope one the day the world sees you as I do.” You continue as Tony’s lips curl into a soft smile, resting his hand on your cheek.

“You may be Iron Man to the world but to me, you are Tony Stark, the love of my life.”

“Tony.. look at me, you’re at home, okay? I need you to breathe for me, breathe in for four seconds and breathe out for four seconds, do it with me.” You say, putting a hand on his own that was on his chest, not wanting to suffocate him but wanting him to feel grounded.

He slowly opened his eyes, looking back at you with his red rimmed eyes, blinking rapidly as he tried to mimic your breathing pattern.

“You’re okay.” You whispered as his breathing pattern gradually got better, feeling himself calm down from his panic attack he looked at you embarrassed.

“I’m sorry you ha-”

“Don’t you dare finish that sentence Stark, you shouldn’t be sorry for anything, but please don’t hide your feelings from me-” You say as you hold his hands in between your own, leaving a kiss on his knuckles.

“I love you and appreciate you, okay? I love you Tony Stark and I want you to know that you CAN talk to me about anything because I am here for you.” You ramble.

“W-why?” He says, surprised from your speech.

“Because I know you. I know how much you care for people, strangers, loved ones and even people you’ve only known for a couple seconds. You are the most selfless, caring person I have ever met and would sacrifice yourself for the safety of others. You are a role model to others and myself-”

“You, Tony Stark, an amazing person inside and out and I hope one the day the world sees you as I do.” You continue as Tony’s lips curl into a soft smile, resting his hand on your cheek.

“You may be Iron Man to the world but to me, you are Tony Stark, the love of my life.”

body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Bnld2O

by TenSpencerRiedPlease

Peter grins, “Q&A, this should be fun. How many of those reference threesomes?” he asks Tony, who snorts. Stephen makes an annoyed noise too and Tony happens to know that’s his least favorite question. They get asked frequently too.

“A lot. I had JARVIS gather the questions that got repeated the most and that was in the top three of the most asked,” he says.
